posts.title: Running training guide
posts.shortDescription: Finish strong... and safe! See a training plan that takes care of your joints as well as your speed!
posts.content: The triathlon is a grueling test of endurance, where competitors swim, cycle, and run consecutively. While each discipline is essential, the final run often determines a triathletes success. Here is a guide to preparing for the running leg of a triathlon. Understanding the Triathlon Run. The triathlon run is unlike a standalone running race. It follows an exhausting swim and bike ride. Itâ€™s not about how fast you can run, but rather how well you can maintain your running speed after depleting your energy reserves in the previous two stages.
posts.author: Sally Sprint

posts.title: Strength training for running
posts.shortDescription: Every movement starts from your core. Build strength for better results and balance
